messages.content: Leave this with me Gus, Iâll speak to the guys at Glasgow and have this arranged for you ðð

Hey Gus! 

Luke here, part of the Business Development team for Chaophraya ð

We are looking for the most engaged social influencers across the city who would like to help us spread the word about our brand and share our passion for food and drink to our community.
In this new chapter for Chaophraya we aim to provide our service excellence with our takeaway/delivery service so you can enjoy the taste of Thai from your own home.

Our invitation to you, is to join our Chaophraya family and take part in receiving a complimentary Chaophraya Dine at Home package up to the value of Â£40, followed by sharing your experience to your online community via an Instagram grid post and story with use of aesthetically pleasing images of your experience / order that we can re-share on our social channels ð

Your passion and enthusiasm for creating content for your followers is inspiring and it would be an honour if you would join us on this venture.

Speak soon! 

Luke Brophy
